sentence: It  is  more  than  two  weeks  since  Hamas  attacked  communities  and  killed  roughly  1,300  people  in  southern  Israel,  and  its  military  responded  with  artillery  and  aerial  bombardments  of  the  Gaza  Strip.

The  crowds  in  London  carried  Palestinian  flags,  with  participants  demanding  that  Israel  end  the  siege  and  discontinue  airstrikes  that  have  killed  more  than  4,000  Palestinians  and  forced  more  than  a  million  Gazans  from  their  homes.
